# The `DependencyTracker` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class discovers DIEs dependencies: marks &quot;live&quot; DIEs, marks <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> locations (whether <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> should be cloned as regular <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> or it should be put into the artificial type unit). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::dwarf_linker::parallel::DependencyTracker</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class discovers DIEs dependencies: marks &quot;live&quot; DIEs, marks <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> locations (whether <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> should be cloned as regular <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> or it should be put into the artificial type unit).

Definition at line 26 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-h">DependencyTracker.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### resolveDependenciesAndMarkLiveness() {#ac29d7dd5c7ba980d5a368339b4fc03af}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DependencyTracker::resolveDependenciesAndMarkLiveness (bool InterCUProcessingStarted, std::atomic&lt; bool &gt; &amp; HasNewInterconnectedCUs)</>}>
Recursively walk the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a></code> tree and look for DIEs to keep.

Store that information in <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a>&#39;s</code> DIEInfo.

This function is the entry point of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> selection algorithm. It is expected to walk the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> tree and(through the mediation of Context.File.Addresses) ask for relocation adjustment value on each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a> that might be a &#39;root <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>&#39;(f.e. subprograms, variables).

Returns true if all dependencies are correctly discovered. Inter-CU dependencies cannot be discovered if referenced <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a> is not analyzed yet. If that is the case this method returns false.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-h/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-h">DependencyTracker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-cpp/#l00108">108</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-cpp">DependencyTracker.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### updateDependenciesCompleteness() {#af28b850047c908b6602c0783a0c4688f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool DependencyTracker::updateDependenciesCompleteness ()">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if dependencies have incompatible placement.

If that is the case modify placement to be compatible. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if any placement was updated, otherwise returns false. This method should be called as a followup processing after <a href="#ac29d7dd5c7ba980d5a368339b4fc03af">resolveDependenciesAndMarkLiveness()</a>.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-h">DependencyTracker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-cpp/#l00245">245</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-cpp">DependencyTracker.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### verifyKeepChain() {#a066fd5533813e5df6d52cb59fc8afd4e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void DependencyTracker::verifyKeepChain ()">
Recursively walk the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a></code> tree and check &quot;keepness&quot; and &quot;placement&quot; information.

Verify the keep chain by looking for DIEs that are kept but who&#39;s parent isn&#39;t.

It is an error if parent node does not have &quot;keep&quot; flag, while child has one. It is an error if parent node has &quot;TypeTable&quot; placement while child has &quot;PlainDwarf&quot; placement. This function dump error at stderr in that case.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-h/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-h">DependencyTracker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-cpp/#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-cpp">DependencyTracker.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### collectRootsToKeep() {#aecab109879b9f476fec35ab74cfd690b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DependencyTracker::collectRootsToKeep (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/unitentrypairty">UnitEntryPairTy</a> &amp; Entry, std::optional&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/unitentrypairty">UnitEntryPairTy</a> &gt; ReferencedBy, bool IsLiveParent)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
This function navigates DIEs tree starting from specified <code>Entry</code>.

It puts found &#39;root <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/die">DIE</a>&#39; into the worklist. The <code>CollectLiveEntries</code> instructs to collect either live roots(like subprograms having live
DW&#95;AT&#95;low&#95;pc) or otherwise roots which is not live(they need to be collected if they are imported f.e. by DW&#95;TAG&#95;imported&#95;module).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-h/#l00212">212</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-h">DependencyTracker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-cpp/#l00134">134</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dependencytracker-cpp">DependencyTracker.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
